anya-e0907n0:3: Sadevakopi ce loko, āgantvā tāsayeyya maṃ;
anya-e0907n0:4: Na me paṭibalo assa, janetuṃ bhayabheravaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:5: Sacepi tvaṃ mahiṃ sabbaṃ, sasamuddaṃ sapabbataṃ;
anya-e0907n0:9: Mā dāni kodhaṃ janayittha, ito uddhaṃ yathā pure;
anya-e0907n0:11: Karotha mettaṃ sattesu, vasantu manujā sukhaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:12: Cattāro āsīvisā uggatejā ghoravisāti kho bhikkhave catunnetaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:13: Pañca vadhakā paccatthikāti kho bhikkhave pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:14: Chaṭṭho antaracaro vadhako ukkhittāsikoti kho bhikkhave nandīrāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:15: Suñño gāmoti kho bhikkhave channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:16: Corā gāmaghātakāti kho bhikkhave channetaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:17: Mahāudakaṇṇavo kho bhikkhave catunnetaṃ oghānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:18: Orimaṃ tīraṃ sāsaṅkaṃ sappaṭibhayanti kho bhikkhave sakkāyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:19: Pārimaṃ tīraṃ khemaṃ appaṭibhayanti kho bhikkhave nibbānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:22: Duṭṭhaṃ nāgaṃ pasādetvā, mocesi bandhanā bahū.
anya-e0907n0:23: Punapi bhante dakkhemu saṅgati ce bhavissati.
anya-e0907n0:25: Devaputto javo nāma, yo me mālaṃ paṭicchati.
anya-e0907n0:26: Muhuttoviya so dibbo, idha vassāni soḷasa;
anya-e0907n0:27: Rattindivo ca so dibbo, mānusiṃ sarado sataṃ.
anya-e0907n0:29: Kalyāṇaṃ yadi vā pāpaṃ, na hi kammaṃ vinassati.
anya-e0907n0:30: Yo icche puriso hotuṃ, jāti jāti punappunaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:32: Yā icche puriso hotuṃ, jāti jāti punappunaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:34: Yo icche dibbabhogañca, dibbamāyuṃ yasaṃ sukhaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:36_0: Yaṃ bhikkhave sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya
anya-e0907n0:36_1: sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
anya-e0907n0:36_2: tamahaṃ jānāmi tamahaṃ abhiññāsiṃ, taṃ tathāgatassa viditaṃ, taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0907n0:37: Iti kho bhikkhave tathāgato diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu tādīyeva tādī, tumhā ca pana tādimhā añño tādī uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthīti vadāmi.
anya-e0907n0:42: Ahaṃ buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato,
anya-e0907n0:44: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupuci mandamūle.
anya-e0907n0:46: Dvāraṃ vā pana nibbāna, nagarassa pavesane.
anya-e0907n0:47: Alameva kātuṃ kalyāṇaṃ, dānaṃ dātuṃ yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:48: Pāṇiṃ kāmadadaṃ disvā, ko puññaṃ nakarissati.
anya-e0907n0:63: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, kāle vassaṃ ciraṃ pajaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:64: Tappetu devo dhammena, rājā rakkhatu mediniṃ.
anya-e0907n0:72: Yaṃ upagato gatamalaṃ, vande tamanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:77: Sammāsambuddheneva hi tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṃ atthavaṇṇanākkamo bhāsito, yāpakiṇṇakadesanāti vuccati, tato saṃgāyanādivasena sāvakehīti ācariyā vadanti.
anya-e0907n0:82: Icceva kato tasmā, tampi gahetvāna saddhimetāya;
anya-e0907n0:87: Cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvī, cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:88: So evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite ānañjappatte ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti –
anya-e0907n0:89: Yaṃhitaṃ bhikkhave sammāvadamāne vadeyya samantapāso mārassāti, mātugāmaṃyeva sammā vadamāno vadeyya samantapāso mārassāti.
anya-e0907n0:90: Yo bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya ca āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetvā.
anya-e0907n0:91: Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāto abhikkamati.
anya-e0907n0:92: Karuṇā viya sattesu, paññā yassa mahesino;
anya-e0907n0:100: Mātaraṃ pamukhaṃ katvā, tassā paññāya tejasā;
anya-e0907n0:104: Yaṃ devadevo devānaṃ, desetvā nayato puna;
anya-e0907n0:107: Yañca sutvāna so thero, āharitvā mahītalaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:110: Yaṃ karomasi brahmuno, samaṃ devehi mārisa;
anya-e0907n0:111: Tadajja tuyhaṃ kassāma, handa sāmaṃ karoma te.
anya-e0907n0:116: Etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
anya-e0907n0:117_0: Cakkhuṃ cāvuso paṭicca rūpeca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā
anya-e0907n0:117_1: vedanā, yaṃ vedeti, taṃ sañjānāti. Yaṃ sañjānāti, taṃ vitakketi, yaṃ vitakketi, taṃ
anya-e0907n0:117_2: papañceti, yaṃ papañceti, tato nidānaṃ purisaṃ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti atītānāgatapaccuppannesu
anya-e0907n0:118: Purimā bhikkhave koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya.
anya-e0907n0:123: Abhikkamissāmi paṭikkamissāmīti hi cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0907n0:128: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tassa, ānubhāvena pāṇino;
anya-e0907n0:132: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, dhamme hontu sagāravā;
anya-e0907n0:133: Sabbepi sattā kālena, sammā devo pavassatu;
anya-e0907n0:142_0: Pucchā – aṭṭhakathā saṃgītiyā āvuso paṭhame sannipāte sakalā ca vinayasaṃvaṇṇanā
anya-e0907n0:142_1: dīghanikāye ca sīlakkhandhavaggavaṇṇanā abhidhamme ca dhammasaṅgahasaṃvaṇṇanā saṃgītā
anya-e0907n0:142_2: therehi chaṭṭhasaṃgītikārehi. Idāni pana dutiye sannipāte dīghanikāye mahāvaggavaṇṇanāto
anya-e0907n0:142_3: paṭṭhāya tadavasesānaṃ yathāvavatthitasaṃvaṇṇanānaṃ saṃgāyanokāso anuppatto. Tasmā
anya-e0907n0:142_4: imissā dutiyasannipātasaṃgītiyā pubbakiccavasena yathānuppattāya mahāvagge mahāpadānasuttasaṃvaṇṇanāya
anya-e0907n0:142_5: pucchāvissajjanaṃ kātuṃ samārabhāma. Mahāpadānasuttassa āvuso nidāne pariyāpannassa
anya-e0907n0:143_0: Vissajjanā – mahāpadānasuttassa bhante nidāne pariyāpannassa karerikuṭikāyantipadassa
anya-e0907n0:143_1: attho “karerikuṭikāya”nti karerīti varuṇarukkhassa nāmaṃ. Karerimaṇḍapo tassā kuṭikāya
anya-e0907n0:143_2: dvāre ṭhito, tasmā karerikuṭikāti vuccati. Yathā kosambarukkhassa dvāreṭhitattā kosambakuṭikāti
anya-e0907n0:145: Karerimaṇḍapo tassā kuṭikāya dvāre ṭhito, tasmā karerikuṭikāti vuccati. Yathā kosambarukkhassa dvāre ṭhitattā ekāsambakuṭikāti.
anya-e0907n0:146: Antojetavane kira karerikuṭi kosambakuṭi gandhakuṭi salaḷāgāranti cattāri mahāgehāni –
anya-e0907n0:150: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso nidāne pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttā dhammīkathā udapādītivacanassa attho kathaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyena kathito.
anya-e0907n0:151_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante nidāne pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttā dhammīkathā udapādīti
anya-e0907n0:151_1: vacanassa attho pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttāti ekampijātiṃ dvepi jātiyoti evaṃ nibaddhena
anya-e0907n0:151_2: pubbenivuṭṭhakhandhasantānasaṅkhātena pubbenivāsena saddhiṃ yojetvā pavattitā. Dhammīti
anya-e0907n0:151_3: dhammasaṃyuttā. Udapādīti aho acchariyaṃ dasabalassa pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ. Pubbenivāsaṃ
anya-e0907n0:151_4: nāma ke anussaranti ke nānussarantīti diṭṭhiyā anussaranti, sāvakā sa paccekabuddhā
anya-e0907n0:151_5: ca buddhā ca anussaranti. Kataradiṭṭhiyo anussaranti. Ye aggapattā kammavādino tepi
anya-e0907n0:151_6: cattālīsaṃyeva kappe anussaranti, na tato paranti evamādinā bhante aṭṭhakathācariyena kathito.
anya-e0907n0:152: Pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttāti ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyoti evaṃ nibaddhena pubbenivuṭṭhakhandhasantānasaṅkhātena pubbenivāsena saddhiṃ yojetvā pavattitā.
anya-e0907n0:154: Pucchā – tasmiṃ āvuso mahāpadānasutte uddesavāre navasu paricchedavāresu paṭhame kappaparicchedavāre bhaddakappeti padassa attho aṭṭhakathācariyena kathaṃ kathito.
anya-e0907n0:155_0: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃ bhante mahāpadānasutte uddesavāre navasu paricchedavāresu paṭhame
anya-e0907n0:155_1: kappaparicchedavāre bhaddakappeti padassa attho bhaddakappeti pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā
anya-e0907n0:155_2: sundarakappe sārakappeti bhagavā imaṃ kappaṃ thomento evamāha. Yato paṭṭhāya kira
anya-e0907n0:155_3: amhākaṃ bhagavā abhinīhāro kato, ekasmiṃ antare ekasmimpi kappe pañcabuddhā nibbattā
anya-e0907n0:155_4: nāma natthīti evamādinā bhante aṭṭhakathācariyena kathito.
anya-e0907n0:156: Vipassissa bhikkhave bhagavato ito so bhikkhave chanavutikappe yaṃ vipassī bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho loke udapādi –
anya-e0907n0:157: Saddakappeti pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā sundarakappe sārakappeti bhagavā imaṃ kappaṃ thomento evamāha –
anya-e0907n0:158: “Yato paṭṭhāya kira amhākaṃ bhagavatābhinīhāro kato, etasmiṃ antare ekasmimpi kappe pañcabuddhā nibbattā nāma natthi” –
anya-e0907n0:160: Pucchā – catutthe panāvuso āyuparicchedavāre appaṃ vā bhiyyoti etesaṃ padānaṃ attho kathaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyena kathito.
anya-e0907n0:161_0: Vissajjanā – catutthe pana bhante āyuparicchedavāre appaṃ vā bhiyyoti etesaṃ padānaṃ
anya-e0907n0:161_1: attho “appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato vā upari appaṃ, aññaṃ vassasataṃ apatvā vīsaṃ
anya-e0907n0:161_2: vā tiṃsaṃ vā cattālīsaṃ vā paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati. Evaṃ dīghāyuko pana
anya-e0907n0:161_3: atidullabho, asuko kira evaṃ ciraṃ jīvatīti tattha tattha gantvā daṭṭhabbo hotī”ti
anya-e0907n0:162: Mayhaṃ bhikkhave etarahi appakaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ parittaṃ lahukaṃ yo ciraṃ jīvati so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo.
anya-e0907n0:163: Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato vā upari appaṃ, ayyaṃ vassasataṃ apatvā vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ vā cattālīsaṃvā vā paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati–
anya-e0907n0:165: Pucchā – aṭṭhame panāvuso upaṭṭhākaparicchedavāre ānandotipade kathaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyena vaṇṇito.
anya-e0907n0:166: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhame pana bhante upaṭṭhākaparicchede pana ānandoti nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti evamādinā bhante aṭṭhakathācariyena vaṇṇito.
anya-e0907n0:167: Mayhaṃ bhikkhave etarahi ānando nāma bhikkhu upaṭṭhāko ahosi aggupaṭṭhāko–
anya-e0907n0:171: Ekacce bhikkhū iminā maggena gacchāmāti vutte aññena gacchanti.
anya-e0907n0:172: Uṭṭhehi āvuso ānanda, uṭṭhehi āvuso ānanda.
anya-e0907n0:181: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi, puna gehaṃ na kāhasi.
anya-e0907n0:182: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
anya-e0907n0:187: Paññāpetuṃ gati natthi, pattānaṃ acalaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:188: Na pana bhagavā milakkhusadiso hoti nāpi āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalo.
anya-e0907n0:190: Na kho ānanda ettāvatā tathāgato sakkato vā hoti garukato vā mānito vā pūjito vā apacito vā.
anya-e0907n0:191: Kasmā pana bhagavā aññattha ekaṃ umāpupphamattampi gahetvā buddha guṇe āvajjetvā katāya pūjāya buddhañāṇenāpi aparicchinnaṃ vipākaṃ vaṇṇetvā–
anya-e0907n0:192_0: Yo kho ānanda bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno
anya-e0907n0:192_1: viharati sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī so tathā gataṃ sakkaroti garukaroti māneti
anya-e0907n0:193: Siyā kho panānanda tumhākaṃ evamassa ‘atītasatthukaṃ pāvacanaṃ, natthi no satthā’ti.
anya-e0907n0:194: Na kho panetaṃ ānanda evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:195: Dhammopi desito ceva paññattoca, vinayopi desito ceva paññatto ca–
anya-e0907n0:196: Assosi kho rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto bhagavā kira kusinārāyaṃ parinibbutoti.
anya-e0907n0:197_0: Satthā nāma parinibbuto, na so sakkā puna āharituṃ, pothujjanikasaddhāya pana amhākaṃ
anya-e0907n0:197_1: raññā sadiso natthi, sace esa imināva niyāmena suṇissati, hadayamassa phalissati.
anya-e0907n0:198: Deva amhehi supinako diṭṭho, tassa paṭighātatthaṃ tumhehi dukūladupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā yathā nāsāpuṭamattaṃ paññāyati, evaṃ catumadhuradoṇiyā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti.
anya-e0907n0:199: Deva maraṇato muccanakasatto nāma natthi, amhākaṃ āyuvaḍḍhano cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ puññakkhettaṃ abhisekasiñcako so bhagavā satthā kusinārāya parinibbutoti.
anya-e0907n0:200_0: Bhagavā sabbaññu nanu imasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā dhammaṃ desayittha, sokasallaṃ me vinodayittha,
anya-e0907n0:200_1: tumhe mayhaṃ sokasallaṃ nīharittha, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, idāni pana me paṭivacanampi na detha bhagavāti.
anya-e0907n0:201: Nanu bhagavā ahaṃ aññadā evarūpe kāle tumhe mahābhikkhu saṅghaparivārā jambudīpatale cārikaṃ carathāti suṇomi.
anya-e0907n0:202: Mama parideviteneva na sijjhati, dasabalassa dhātuyo āharāpessāmīti evaṃ assosi.
anya-e0907n0:203: Sace dassanti, sundaraṃ. No ce dassanti, āharaṇupāyena āharissāmīti caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā sayampi nikkhantoyeva.
anya-e0907n0:204: Yathā ca ajātasattu, evaṃ licchavī ādayopi.
anya-e0907n0:205: Amhākaṃ dhātuyo vā dentu, yuddhaṃ vāti kusinārānagaraṃ parivāretvā ṭhite etaṃ bhagavā amhākaṃ gāmakkhettehi paṭivacanaṃ avocuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:206_0: Na mayaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ pahiṇimha, nāpi gantvā ānayimha. Satthā pana sayameva āgantvā
anya-e0907n0:206_1: sāsanaṃ pesetvā amhe pakkosāpesi. Tumhepi kho pana yaṃ tumhākaṃ gāmakkhette ratanaṃ
anya-e0907n0:206_2: uppajjati. Na taṃ amhākaṃ detha. Sadevake ca loke buddharatanasamaṃ ratanaṃ nāma
anya-e0907n0:206_3: natthi, evarūpaṃ uttamaratanaṃ labhitvā mayaṃ nadassāma, na kho pana tumhehiyeva
anya-e0907n0:206_4: mātuthanato khīraṃ pītaṃ. Amhehipi mātuthanato khīraṃ pītaṃ, na tumheyeva purisā,
anya-e0907n0:206_5: amhepi purisā. Hotūti aññamaññaṃ ahaṃkāraṃ katvā sāsanapaṭisāsanaṃ pesenti. Aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0907n0:207: Ete rājāno bhagavato parinibbutaṭṭhāne vivādaṃ karonti, na kho panetaṃ patirūpaṃ, alaṃ iminā kalahena, vūpasamessāmi nanti.
anya-e0907n0:208: Ācariyassa viya bho saddo, ācariyassa viya bho saddoti sabbe niravā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:219: Na hi sādhukaṃ uttamapuggalassa, sarīrabhāge siyā sampahāroti na hi sādhuyanti na hi sādhu ayaṃ –
anya-e0907n0:220_0: Bhagavā sabbasu pubbe mayaṃ tumhākaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ chabbaṇṇabuddharasmikhacitaṃ
anya-e0907n0:220_1: asītianubyañjanasamujjalitasobhaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ addasāma, idāni pana suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva
anya-e0907n0:220_2: dhātuyo avasiṭṭhā jātā, nayuttamidaṃ bhagavā tumhākanti parideviṃsu.
anya-e0907n0:221_0: Kena nu kho sadevakassa lokassa kaṅkhacchedanatthāya catusaccakathāya paccayabhūtā
anya-e0907n0:221_1: bhagavato dakkhiṇadāṭhā gahitāti olokento brāhmaṇena gahitāti disvā brāhmaṇopi daṭhāya
anya-e0907n0:221_2: anucchavikaṃ sakkāraṃ nasakkhissati gaṇhāmi natthi veṭṭhantarato gahetvā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭake
anya-e0907n0:222: Rājagahe bhagavato sarīrānaṃ thūpañca mahañca akāsi.
anya-e0907n0:223: Samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbutakālato paṭṭhāya balakkārena sādhukīḷitāya upaddutumha, sabbe no kammantā naṭṭhāti.
anya-e0907n0:224_0: Mahājano manaṃ padosetvā apāye nibbattīti disvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ dhātuāharaṇūpāyaṃ
anya-e0907n0:224_1: kāressāmāti tassa santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā dhātuāharaṇūpāyaṃ karomi mahārājāti āhaṃsu.
anya-e0907n0:225_0: Bhante puthujjano nāma ajātasattunā samo saddho nāma natthi, na so mama vacanaṃ karissati,
anya-e0907n0:225_1: apica kho māravibhiṃ sakasadisaṃ vibhiṃsakaṃ dassessāmi mahāsaddaṃ sāvessāmi yakkhagāhakakhipitakaarocake
anya-e0907n0:225_2: karissāmi, tumhe amanussā mahārāja kupitā dhātuyo āharāpethāti vadeyyātha, evaṃ so āharāpessatīti–
anya-e0907n0:226: Mahārāja amanussā kupitā, dhātuyo āharāpehīti bhaṇiṃsu.
anya-e0907n0:227: Na tāva bhante mayhaṃ cittaṃ tussati, evaṃ santepi āharantūti āha.
anya-e0907n0:228: Mahārāja ekaṃ dhātunidhānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha.
anya-e0907n0:231: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne yo pāsāṇo atthi, so antaradhāyatu, paṃsu suvisuddhā hotu, udakaṃ mā uṭṭhahatūti adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0907n0:232: Idha rājā kiṃ kāretīti pucchantānampi mahāsāvakānaṃ cetiyānīti vadanti.
anya-e0907n0:233: Mālā mā milāyantu, gandhā mā vinassantu, dīpā mā vijjhāyantūti adhiṭṭhahitvā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe akkharāni chindāpesi –
anya-e0907n0:234: Anāgate piyadoso nāma kumāro chattaṃ ussāpetvā asoko dhammarājā bhavissati, so imā dhātuyo vitthārikā karissatīti.
anya-e0907n0:235: Anāgate daliddarājā imaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā dhātūnaṃ sakkāraṃ karotūti akkharaṃ chindāpesi.
anya-e0907n0:236: Tāta ajātasattunā dhātunidhānaṃ kataṃ, ettha ārakkhaṃ paṭṭhapehīti pahiṇi.
anya-e0907n0:239: Nassati vata bho me ayaṃ sampattīti bhayābhibhūto ahosi.
anya-e0907n0:240_0: Atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā lokapitā maho mahābrahmāvā, yo me hadayanissitaṃ
anya-e0907n0:240_1: sokasallaṃ samuddharitvā imaṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ kareyyāti olokento kañci adisvā
anya-e0907n0:240_2: puna addasa mādisānaṃ satasahassānampi uppannaṃ sokasallaṃ sammāsambuddho uddharituṃ paṭibaloti.
anya-e0907n0:241_0: Aparipakkaṃ tāvassa ñāṇaṃ, katipāhaṃ pana atikkamitvā mayi indasālaguhāyaṃ viharante
anya-e0907n0:241_1: pañca pubbanimittāni disvā maraṇabhayabhīto dvīsu devalokesu devatāhi saddhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0907n0:241_2: cuddasa pañhe pucchitvā upekkhāpañhavissajjanāvasāne asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ
anya-e0907n0:242_0: Mama pubbepi ekakassa gatattā satthārā okāso nakato, addhā me natthi maggaphalassa
anya-e0907n0:242_1: upanissayo, ekassa pana upanissaye sati cakkavāḷapariyantāyapi parisāya bhagavā dhammaṃ
anya-e0907n0:242_2: desetiyeva. Avassaṃ kho pana dvīsu devalokesu kassaci devassa upanissayo bhavissati,
anya-e0907n0:242_3: taṃ sandhāya satthā dammaṃ desessati. Taṃ sutvā ahampi attano domanassaṃ vūpasamessāmīti.
anya-e0907n0:243_0: Dvīsu devalokesu devatā gahetvā dhurena paharantassa viya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamituṃ
anya-e0907n0:243_1: nayuttaṃ, ayaṃpana pañcasikho dasabalassa upaṭṭhāko vallabho icchiticchitakkhaṇe
anya-e0907n0:243_2: gantvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā dhammaṃ suṇāti, imaṃ purato pesetvā okāsaṃ kāretvā iminā
anya-e0907n0:243_3: katokāse upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchissāmīti okāsakaraṇatthaṃ āmantesi.
anya-e0907n0:244_0: Evaṃ mahārāja hotu, bhaddaṃ tava yo tvaṃ maṃ ehi mārisa uyyāna kīḷādīni vā naṭasamajjādīni
anya-e0907n0:244_1: vā dassanāya gacchāmāti avatvā buddhaṃ passissāma dhammaṃ sossāmāti vadasīti daḷhataraṃ
anya-e0907n0:244_2: upatthambhento devānamindassa vacanaṃ paṭissutvā anucariyaṃ sahacaraṇaṃ ekato gamanaṃ upāgami.
anya-e0907n0:245: Vande te pitaraṃ bhadde, timbaruṃ sūriyavacchase;
anya-e0907n0:247_0: Evaṃ vutte bhagavā pañcasikhaṃ gandhabbadevaputtaṃ etadavoca. Saṃsandati kho te pañcasikha
anya-e0907n0:247_1: tantissaro gītassarena gītassaro ca tantissarena, naca pana te pañcasikha tantissaro
anya-e0907n0:247_2: gītassaraṃ ativattati gītassaro ca tantissaraṃ. Kadā saṃyūḷhā pana te pañcasikha
anya-e0907n0:247_3: vmi gāthā buddhūpasañhitā dhammūpasañhitā saṃyūpasañhitā arahantūpasañhitā kāmūpasañhitāti –
anya-e0907n0:248_0: Bhagavatā pañcasikhassa okāso nakatoti devatā gahetvā tatova paṭinivatteyya. Tato
anya-e0907n0:248_1: mahājāniyo bhaveyya, vaṇṇe pana kathite kato bhagavatā pañcasikhassa okāsoti devatāhi
anya-e0907n0:248_2: saddhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanāvasāne asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ
anya-e0907n0:249: Atha kho bhagavā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca “acchariyamidaṃ āyasmato kosiyassa, abbhutamidaṃ āyasmato kosiyassa tāva bahukiccassa bahukaraṇīyassa yadidaṃ idhāgamana”nti.
anya-e0907n0:250_0: Cirapaṭikāhaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo, api ca devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ
anya-e0907n0:250_1: kehici kehici kiccakaraṇīyehi byāvaṭo, evāhaṃ nāsakkhiṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ.
anya-e0907n0:251: Te “tava santakā, mama santakā”ti nicchetuṃ asakkontā aḍḍaṃ karonti, sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ pucchanti, so “yassa vimānaṃ āsannataraṃ, tassa santakā”ti vadati.
anya-e0907n0:252: Yassa vimānaṃ olokentī ṭhitā, tassa santakāti vadati.
anya-e0907n0:253_0: Idheva bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ gopikā nāma sakyadhītā ahosi buddhe pasannā dhamme
anya-e0907n0:253_1: pasannā saṅghe pasannā sīlesu paripūrakārinī, sā itthittaṃ virājetvā purisattaṃ bhāvetvā
anya-e0907n0:253_2: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā.
anya-e0907n0:256: Puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
anya-e0907n0:257: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te.
anya-e0907n0:258_0: Kiṃ saṃyojanā nu kho mārisa devā manussā asurā nāgā gandhabbā ye caññe santi puthukāyā,
anya-e0907n0:258_1: te averā adaṇḍā asapattā abyāpajjā viharemu averinoti iti ca nesaṃ hoti. Atha ca
anya-e0907n0:258_2: pana saverā sadaṇḍā sasapattā sabyāpajjā viharanti saverinoti.
anya-e0907n0:259_0: Issāmacchariyasaṃyojanā kho devānaminda devā manussā asurā nāgā gandhabbā yecaññe
anya-e0907n0:259_1: santi puthukāyā, te averā adaṇḍā asapattā abyāpajjā viharemu averinoti iti ca nesaṃhoti,
anya-e0907n0:259_2: atha ca pana saverā sadaṇḍā sasapattā sabyāpajjā viharanti saverinoti.
anya-e0907n0:260: Issatīti issā, sā parasampattīnaṃ usūyanalakkhaṇā, tattheva anabhiratirasā, tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, parasampatti padaṭṭhānā, saṃyojananti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0907n0:261_0: Maccherabhāvo macchariyaṃ, taṃladdhānaṃ vā labhitabbānaṃ vā attano sampattīnaṃ nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:261_1: tāsaṃyeva parehi sādhāraṇabhāva akkhamanarasaṃ, saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, kaṭukañcukatā
anya-e0907n0:261_2: paccupaṭṭhānaṃ vā, attasampattipadaṭṭhānaṃ, cetaso virūpabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:262: Kiṃ vaṇṇo esoti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ vadanto pariyattiñca kassaci kiñci adento dubbaṇṇo ceva eḷamūgoca hoti.
anya-e0907n0:263: Yāva taṃ nappahīyati, tāva devamanussā averatādīni patthayantāpi verādīni naparimuccantiyeva.
anya-e0907n0:264: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavantaṃ uttari pañhaṃ apucchi–
anya-e0907n0:265: Issāmacchariyaṃ pana mārisa kiṃ nidānaṃ kiṃ samudayaṃ kiṃ jātikaṃ kiṃ pabhavaṃ, kismiṃ sati issāmacchariyaṃ hoti, kismiṃ asati issāmacchariyaṃ na hotīti.
anya-e0907n0:266_0: Issāmacchariyaṃ kho devānaminda piyāppiyanidānaṃ piyāppiyasamudayaṃ piyāppiyajātikaṃ
anya-e0907n0:266_1: piyāppiyapabhavaṃ, piyāppiye sati issāmacchariyaṃ hoti, piyāppiye asati issāmacchariyaṃ nahotīti.
anya-e0907n0:267: Na sakkā dātuṃ, kilamissati vā ukkaṇṭhissati vātiādīni vatvā macchariyaṃ karoti.
anya-e0907n0:268: Aho vatassa evarūpaṃ na bhaveyyāti issaṃ karoti.
anya-e0907n0:269: Mayampetaṃ mamāyantā na paribhuñjāma, na sakkā dātunti macchariya karoti.
anya-e0907n0:270: Ṭhapetvā maṃ ko añño evarūpassa lābhīti issaṃ vā karoti, yācito tāvakālikampi adadamāno macchariyaṃ vā karoti.
anya-e0907n0:271: Piyāppiyaṃ kho pana mārisa kiṃnidānaṃ kiṃsamudayaṃ kiṃjātikaṃ kiṃpabhavaṃ, kismiṃ sati piyāppiyaṃ hoti, kismiṃ asati piyāppiyaṃ na hotīti.
anya-e0907n0:272: Piyāppiyaṃ kho devānaminda chandanidānaṃ chandasamudayaṃ chandajātikaṃ chandapabhavaṃ, chande sati piyāppiyaṃ hoti, chande asati piyāppiyaṃ na hotīti.
anya-e0907n0:273: Chandanidānantiettha pariyesanachando, paṭilābhachando, paribhoga chando, sannidhichando, vissajjanachandoti pañcavidho chando.
anya-e0907n0:274: Ime maṃ rakkhissanti gopissanti mamāyissanti samparivārayissantīti.
anya-e0907n0:275_0: Chando kho pana mārisa kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo, kismiṃ sati chando
anya-e0907n0:275_1: hoti, kismiṃ asati chando nahotīti. Chando kho devānaminda vitakkanidāno vitakkasamudayo
anya-e0907n0:275_2: vitakkajātiko vitakkapabhavo, vitakke sati chando hoti, vitakke asati chando na hotīti.
anya-e0907n0:276_0: Ettakaṃ rūpassa bhavissati, ettakaṃ saddassa, ettakaṃ gandhassa, ettakaṃ rasassa,
anya-e0907n0:276_1: ettakaṃ phoṭṭhabbassa bhavissati, ettakaṃ mayhaṃ bhavissati, ettakaṃ parassa bhavissati,
anya-e0907n0:276_2: ettakaṃ nidahissāmi, ettakaṃ parassa dassāmīti vavatthānaṃ vitakkavinicchayena hoti.
anya-e0907n0:277: Kathaṃ paṭipanno pana mārisa bhikkhu papañcasaññāsaṅkhānirodhasāruppagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hotīti.
anya-e0907n0:278_0: Somanassaṃpāhaṃ devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbaṃpi asevitabbaṃpi. Domanassaṃpāhaṃ
anya-e0907n0:278_1: devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbaṃpi asevitabbaṃpi. Upekkhaṃpāhaṃ devānaminda
anya-e0907n0:279: Kiṃ pana bhagavatā pucchitaṃ kathitaṃ apucchitaṃ, sānusandhikaṃ ananusandhikanti.
anya-e0907n0:280: Pucchitameva kathitaṃ no apucchitaṃ. Sānusandhikameva no ananusandhikaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:281: Ime pañcakkhandhā kiṃ hetukāti upaparikkhandho avijjādihetukāti passati.
anya-e0907n0:284_0: “Somanassaṃpāhaṃ devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbaṃpi asevitabbaṃpī”ti itikho
anya-e0907n0:284_1: panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ jaññā somanassaṃ “imaṃ kho me
anya-e0907n0:284_2: somanassaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti, evarūpaṃ
anya-e0907n0:284_3: somanassaṃ na sevitabbaṃ. Tattha yaṃ jaññā somanassaṃ “imaṃ kho me somanassaṃ sevato
anya-e0907n0:284_4: akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”ti, evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ sevitabbaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:284_5: Tattha yaṃ ce savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ, yaṃce avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ, ye avitakke avicāre,
anya-e0907n0:284_6: te paṇītatare. “Somanassaṃpāhaṃ devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbaṃpi asevitabbaṃpī”ti
anya-e0907n0:284_7: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:285: Na laddhaṃ vata me sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāretunti āvajjato domanassaṃ uppajjati, assudhārā pavattanti gāmanta pabbhāravāsī mahāsīvattherassa viya.
anya-e0907n0:286_0: Amhākaṃ ācariyo aññesaṃ avassayo hoti, attano bhavituṃ na sakkoti, ovādamassa dassāmīti
anya-e0907n0:286_1: ākāsena gantvā vihārasamīpe otaritvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnaṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vattaṃ
anya-e0907n0:288: Na te tumhākaṃ anumodanāya atthoti ākāse uppatitvā agamāsi.
anya-e0907n0:289_0: Imassa bhikkhuno pariyattiyā kammaṃ natthi, mayhaṃ pana aṅkusako bhavissāmīti āgatoti
anya-e0907n0:289_1: ñatvā idāni okāso na bhavissati, paccūsakāle gamissāmīti pattacīvaraṃ samīpe katvā
anya-e0907n0:289_2: sabbaṃ divasabhāgaṃ paṭhamayāma majjhimayāmañca dhammaṃ vācetvā pacchimayāme ekasmiṃ
anya-e0907n0:289_3: there uddesaṃ gahetvā nikkhante pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā teneva saddhiṃ nikkhanto.
anya-e0907n0:290: Tato “na mañce mayhaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi maggaphalaṃ uppajjissati arahattaṃ apatvā neva mañce piṭṭhiṃ pasāressāmi, na pāde dhovissāmīti mañcaṃ ussāpetvā ṭhapesi.
anya-e0907n0:291_0: Idāni me tiṃsavassāni samaṇadhammaṃ karontassa, nāsakkhiṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ, addhā
anya-e0907n0:291_1: me imasmiṃ attabhāve maggovā phalaṃvā natthi, na me laddhaṃ sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ
anya-e0907n0:292_0: Bho mahāsīvatthera devatāpi tayā saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karonti, anucchavikaṃ nu kho te etanti
anya-e0907n0:292_1: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ aggahesi. So idāni nipajjissāmīti
anya-e0907n0:292_2: senāsanaṃ paṭijaggitvā mañcakaṃ paññapetvā udakaṭṭhāne udakaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā pāde
anya-e0907n0:293: Apetha bhante mātugāmoti okāsaṃ kāretvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā purato ukkuṭiko nisīditvā pāde dhovissāmīti āha.
anya-e0907n0:298_0: Dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā, atthi me tumhesu anukampā, kinti
anya-e0907n0:298_1: me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādāti. Tumhe ca bhikkhave āmisadāyādā
anya-e0907n0:298_2: bhaveyyātha, no dhammadāyādā. Tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyātha, āmisa dāyādā satthusāvakā
anya-e0907n0:298_3: viharanti, no dhammadāyādāti. Ahampitena ādiyo bhaveyyaṃ āmisadāyādā satthu sāvakā
anya-e0907n0:298_4: viharanti, no dhammadāyādāti. Tumhe ca me bhikkhave dhammadāyādā bhaveyyātha no āmisadāyādā.
anya-e0907n0:298_5: Tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyātha dhammadāyādā satthu sāvakā viharanti, no āmisadāyādāti.
anya-e0907n0:298_6: Ahampi tena na ādiyo bhaveyyaṃ. Dhammadāyādā satthu sāvakā viharanti, no āmisadāyādāti.
anya-e0907n0:298_7: Tasmātiha me bhikkhave dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā, atthime tumhesu anukampā,
anya-e0907n0:298_8: kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādāti.
anya-e0907n0:299: Kahaṃ buddho kahaṃ bhagavā kahaṃ devadevo narāsabho purisasīhoti bhagavantaṃ pariyesanti.
anya-e0907n0:300_0: Vuttampicetaṃ “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito
anya-e0907n0:301: Yāvatā kho cunda etarahi saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṃ cunda aññaṃ ekasaṅghampi samanupassāmi, evaṃ lābhagga yasaggapattaṃ, yathariva cunda bhikkhusaṅghoti.
anya-e0907n0:302_0: Amhākaṃ ācariyassa detha, upajjhāyassa dethāti uccāsadda mahāsaddaṃ karonti. Sā ca
anya-e0907n0:302_1: nesaṃ pavatti bhagavatopi pākaṭā ahosi. Tato bhagavā ananucchavikanti dhammasaṃvegaṃ uppādetvā cintesi.
anya-e0907n0:303: Paccayā akappiyāti na sakkā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetuṃ. Paccayapaṭibaddhā hi kulaputtānaṃ samaṇadhammavutti. Handāhaṃ dhammadāyādapaṭipadaṃ desemi.
anya-e0907n0:304_0: Sā sikkhākāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sikkhāpadapaññatti viya bhavissati nagaradvāre ṭhapitasabbakāyikaādāso
anya-e0907n0:304_1: viya ca, yathā hi nagara dvāre ṭhapite sabbakāyike ādāse cattāro vaṇṇā attano chāyaṃ
anya-e0907n0:305_0: So hi brāhmaṇa bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā,
anya-e0907n0:305_1: anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū maggavidū maggakovidotica. So hāvuso bhagavā
anya-e0907n0:305_2: jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā
anya-e0907n0:305_3: pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgatotica, ….
anya-e0907n0:306: Paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
anya-e0907n0:307: Are tvaṃ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā īdisaṃ icchaṃ uppādesi.
anya-e0907n0:309: Amhākaṃ bhadanto subharo thokenapi tussati, mayameva naṃ posissāmāti paṭiññaṃ katvā posenti.
anya-e0907n0:310: “Are tvaṃ nāma tadā sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tathā jighacchādubbalyaparetopi samaṇadhammaṃ katvā ajja kosajjamanuyuñjasi” –
anya-e0907n0:311: Yā ca kho ānandakathā abhisallekhitā cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. Seyyathidaṃ appicchakathāti …,.
anya-e0907n0:312: Idamavoca bhagavā, idaṃ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
anya-e0907n0:313_0: Imaṃ mayā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ vitthārena avibhattaṃ, dhammapaṭiggāhakā
anya-e0907n0:313_1: bhikkhū uggahetvā ānandaṃ vā kaccānaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pucchissanti, te mayhaṃ ñāṇena
anya-e0907n0:313_2: saṃsandetvā kathessanti, tato dhammapaṭiggāhakā puna maṃ pucchissanti, tesaṃ ahaṃ
anya-e0907n0:313_3: sukathitaṃ bhikkhave ānandena, sukathitaṃ kaccānena, maṃ cepi tumhe ekamatthaṃ puccheyyātha,
anya-e0907n0:315_0: Evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe, tena kho pana
anya-e0907n0:315_1: samayena āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca nandiyo āyasmā ca kimilo gosiṅgasālavanadāye
anya-e0907n0:315_2: viharanti. Athakho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena gosiṅgasālavanadāyo,
anya-e0907n0:315_3: tenupasaṅkami. Addasā kho dāyapālo bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ. Disvāna bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0907n0:315_4: etadavoca “mā mahāsamaṇa etaṃ dāyaṃ pāvisi, santettha tayo kulaputtā attakāmarūpā
anya-e0907n0:316: Ahaṃ ime kulaputte paggaṇhitvā ukkaṃsitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ nesaṃ desessāmīti.
anya-e0907n0:317: Assosi kho āyasmā anuruddho dāyapālassa bhagavatā saddhiṃ mantayamānassa. Sutvāna dāyapālaṃ etadavoca, mā āvuso dāyapāla bhagavantaṃ vāresi, satthā no bhagavā anuppattoti.
anya-e0907n0:318: Mayaṃ tayo janā idha viharāma, aññe pabbajitā nāma natthi, ayañca dāyapālo pabbajitena viya saddhiṃ katheti, ko nu kho bhavissatīti.
anya-e0907n0:319: Ayaṃ dāyapālo phaṇakataṃ āsivisaṃ gīvāya gahetuṃ hatthaṃ pasārentoviya loke aggapuggalena saddhiṃ kathentova na jānāti, aññatarabhikkhunā viya saddhiṃ kathetīti.
anya-e0907n0:320_0: Mayaṃ tayo janā samaggavāyaṃ vasāma. Sacāhaṃ ekakova paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi. Samaggavāso
anya-e0907n0:320_1: nāma na bhavissatīti piyamitte gahetvāva paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi. Yathā ca bhagavā
anya-e0907n0:320_2: mayhaṃ piyo, evaṃ sahāyānampi me piyoti, tehi saddhiṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātukāmo sayaṃ
anya-e0907n0:321_0: Tassa mayhaṃ bhante evaṃ hoti, yaṃ nūnāhaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā imesaṃyeva āyasmantānaṃ
anya-e0907n0:321_1: cittassa vasena vatteyyanti. So kho ahaṃ bhante sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā imesaṃyeva
anya-e0907n0:321_2: āyasmantānaṃ cittassa vasena vattāmi, nānāhi kho no bhante kāyā ekañca pana maññe cittanti.
anya-e0907n0:322: Sādhu sādhu anuruddhā, kacci pana vo anuruddhā appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharathāti.
anya-e0907n0:323: Taggha mayaṃ bhante appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharāmāti.
anya-e0907n0:324: Yathā kathaṃ pana tumhe anuruddhā appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharathāti.
anya-e0907n0:325: Atthi pana vo anuruddhā evaṃ appamattānaṃ ātāpīnaṃ pahitattānaṃ viharantānaṃ uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāroti.
anya-e0907n0:326_0: Kiṃ hi no siyā bhante. Idha mayaṃ bhante yāvadeva ākaṅkhāma, vivicceva kāmehi vivicca
anya-e0907n0:326_1: akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
anya-e0907n0:326_2: viharāma, ayaṃ kho no bhante amhākaṃ appamattānaṃ ātāpīnaṃ pahitattānaṃ viharantānaṃ
anya-e0907n0:330: Evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane.
anya-e0907n0:331: Nāsakkhi migaṃ gahetunti apavādamocanatthaṃ kājenādāya āgacchanto nagarassāvidūre bahalapattapalāsaṃ mahānigrodhaṃ disvā parissamavinodanatthaṃ tassa mūlamupagato.
anya-e0907n0:332: Ye ye vajjā honti, te te sandhāya “yo jīvitatthiko, so nikkhamatū”ti bhaṇati.
anya-e0907n0:333: Rājā core gahetvā yakkhassa detīti manussā corakamma to paṭiviratā. Tato aparena samayena navacorānaṃ abhāvena purāṇacorānañca parikkhayena bandhanāgārāni suññāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:334: Rājā amhākaṃ pitaraṃ amhākaṃ pitāmahaṃ pesetīti manussā khobhaṃ karissanti, mā vo etaṃ ruccīti vāresi.
anya-e0907n0:335: Natthi deva nagare dārako ṭhapetvā antepure tava puttaṃ āḷavakakumāranti.
anya-e0907n0:336_0: Atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0907n0:336_1: nikkhama samaṇāti. Sādhāvusoti bhagavā nikkhami. Pavisa samaṇāti. Sādhāvusoti bhagavā
anya-e0907n0:336_2: pāvisi. Dutiyampi kho oḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca nikkhama samaṇāti. Sādhāvusoti
anya-e0907n0:336_3: bhagavā nikkhami. Pavisa samaṇāti. Sādhāvusoti bhagavā pāvisi. Tatiyampi kho āḷavako
anya-e0907n0:336_4: yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca nikkhama samaṇāti. Sādhāvusoti bhagavā nikkhami. Pavisa
anya-e0907n0:336_5: samaṇāti. Sādhāvusoti bhagavā pāvisi. Catutthampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0907n0:336_6: etadavoca nikkhama samaṇāti. Na khvāhaṃ taṃ āvuso nikkhamissāmi. Yaṃ te karaṇīyaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:336_7: taṃ karohīti. Pañhaṃ taṃ samaṇa pucchissāmi, sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṃ vā te
anya-e0907n0:336_8: khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmīti.
anya-e0907n0:336_9: Na khvāhaṃ taṃ āvuso passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā
anya-e0907n0:336_10: pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo me cittaṃ vā khipeyya hadayaṃ vā phāleyya pādesu vā gahetvā
anya-e0907n0:336_11: pāragaṅgāya khipeyya. Apica tvaṃ āvuso puccha yadā kaṅkhasīti.
anya-e0907n0:337: Ko so bhagavānāma, yo mama bhavanaṃ paviṭṭhoti āha.
anya-e0907n0:338_0: Na tvaṃ āvuso jānāsi bhagavantaṃ amhākaṃ satthāraṃ, yo tusitabhavane ṭhito pañcamahāvilokitaṃ
anya-e0907n0:338_1: viloketvātiādinā nayena yāva dammacakkapavattanā kathentā paṭisandhiādīsu dvattiṃsapubbanimittāni
anya-e0907n0:338_2: vatvā imānipi tvaṃ āvuso acchariyāni nāddasāti codesuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:339: Passatha dāni tumhākaṃ vā satthā mahānubhāvo, ahaṃ vāti dakkhiṇapādena saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ kelāsapabbatakūṭaṃ akkami.
anya-e0907n0:340: Yaṃ nūnāhaṃ kenaci ajeyyaṃ dussāvudhaṃ muñceyyanti.
anya-e0907n0:341: Idaṃ kāraṇaṃ mettāvihārayutto samaṇo, handa naṃ rosetvā mettāya viyojemīti iminā sambandhenetaṃ vuttaṃ, atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā…pe… nikkhama samaṇāti.
anya-e0907n0:342: “Subbaco vatāyaṃ samaṇo ekavacaneneva nikkhanto, evaṃ nāma nikkhametuṃ sukhaṃ samaṇaṃ akāraṇenevāhaṃ sakalarattiṃ yuddhena abbhuyyāsinti muducitto hutvā puna cintesi –
anya-e0907n0:343_0: Subbaco ayaṃ samaṇo nikkhamāti vutto nikkhamati. Pavisāti vutto pavisati. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ
anya-e0907n0:343_1: imaṃ samaṇaṃ evameva sakalarattiṃ kilametvā pāde gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyyanti
anya-e0907n0:343_2: pāpakaṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā catutthavāraṃ āha nikkhama samaṇāti.
anya-e0907n0:364: Kathaṃsu tarati oghaṃ, kathaṃsu tarati aṇṇavaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:368: Kathaṃsu labhate paññaṃ, kathaṃsu vindate dhanaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:369: Kathaṃsu kittiṃ pappoti, kathaṃ mittāni ganthati;
anya-e0907n0:370: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, kathaṃ pecca na socatīti–
anya-e0907n0:374: Saccena kittiṃ pappoti, dadaṃ mittāni ganthati.
anya-e0907n0:375: Asmā loko paraṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ pecca na socati.
anya-e0907n0:384: Kathaṃ nu dāni puccheyyaṃ, puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe;
anya-e0907n0:385: Yohaṃ ajja pajānāmi, yo attho samparāyiko.
anya-e0907n0:387: Yohaṃ ajja pajānāmi, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:388: So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
anya-e0907n0:397: Ayaṃ kumāro saraṇamupeti buddhaṃ…pe… dhammaṃ…pe… saṅghaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:399_0: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Tena kho
anya-e0907n0:399_1: pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto magadhesu viharati nālakagāmake ābādhiko dukkhito
anya-e0907n0:399_2: bāḷhagilāno. Cundo ca samaṇuddeso āyasmato sāriputtassa upaṭṭhāko hoti.
anya-e0907n0:400_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto teneva ābādhena parinibbāyi. Atha kho cundo samaṇuddeso
anya-e0907n0:400_1: āyasmato sāriputtassa pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi jetavanaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa
anya-e0907n0:400_2: ārāmo, yenā yasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā
anya-e0907n0:400_3: ekamantaṃ nisīdi, ekamantaṃ nisinno kho cundo samaṇuddeso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0907n0:400_4: “āyasmā bhante sāriputto parinibbuto, idamassa pattacīvara”nti. Atthi kho idaṃ āvuso
anya-e0907n0:400_5: cunda kathā pābhataṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya, āyāmāvuso cunda, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamissāma,
anya-e0907n0:400_6: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocessāmāti. “Evaṃ bhante”ti kho cundo samaṇuddeso
anya-e0907n0:401: Buddhā nu kho paṭhamaṃ parinibbāyanti, udāhu aggasāvakāti.
anya-e0907n0:402: Anujānātu me bhante bhagavā, anujānātu sugato. Parinibbāna kālo me, ossaṭṭho me āyusaṅkhāroti.
anya-e0907n0:404: Atthi bhante magadhesu nālakagāme jātovarako, tatthāhaṃ parinibbāyissāmīti.
anya-e0907n0:405: Yassa dāni tvaṃ sāriputta kālaṃ maññasi, idāni pana te jeṭṭhakaniṭṭha bhātikānaṃ tādisassa bhikkhuno dassanaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissati, desehi nesaṃ dhammanti āha.
anya-e0907n0:406_0: Athakho āyasmā ca ānando cundo ca samaṇuddeso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0907n0:406_1: bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu, ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando
anya-e0907n0:406_2: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ayaṃ bhante cundo samaṇuddeso ‘evamāha āyasmā bhante sāriputto
anya-e0907n0:406_3: parinibbuto, idamassa pattacīvara’nti. Apica me bhante ‘madhuraka jāto viya kāyo,
anya-e0907n0:406_4: disāpi me na pakkhāyanti, dhammāpi maṃ nappaṭibhanti āyasmā sāriputto parinibbuto’ti” sutvā–
anya-e0907n0:425: Apica me bhante madhurakajāto viya kāyo.
anya-e0907n0:426_0: Kiṃ nukho te ānanda sāriputto sīlakkhandhaṃ vā ādāya parinibbuto, samādhikkhandhaṃ
anya-e0907n0:426_1: vā ādāya parinibbuto, paññākkhandhaṃ vā ādāya parinibbuto, vimuttikkhandhaṃ vā ādāya
anya-e0907n0:426_2: parinibbuto, vimutti ñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ vā ādāya parinibbutoti.
anya-e0907n0:427_0: Nanu taṃ ānanda mayā paṭikacceva akkhātaṃ sabbehi piyehi manā pehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo
anya-e0907n0:427_1: aññathābhāvo, taṃ kutettha ānanda labbhā “yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:427_2: taṃ vata māpalujjī”ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
anya-e0907n0:429_0: Tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:429_1: Idha tathāgato “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ
anya-e0907n0:429_2: niccato upagaccheyya netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti pajānāti, “ṭhānañca kho etaṃ vijjati
anya-e0907n0:429_3: yaṃ puthujjano kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti –
anya-e0907n0:434: Mayā bhante uppanno coro na sakkā paṭibāhituṃ, saṅgho parasamuddaṃ gacchatu, ahaṃ samuddārakkhaṃ karissāmīti.
anya-e0907n0:436: Nāhaṃ bhante tumhesu agacchantesu gamissāmīti yāvatatiyaṃ kathetvāpi theraṃ āropetuṃ asakkontā nivattiṃsu.
anya-e0907n0:437: Evarūpassa nāma lābhaggayasaggappattassa sarīradhātunicayaṭṭhānaṃ anāthaṃ jātanti cintayamāno nisīdi.
anya-e0907n0:438_0: Bhante etaṃ paṇṇakhādakamanussānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, dhūmo paññāyati, ahaṃ purato gamissāmīti
anya-e0907n0:438_1: theraṃ vanditvā attano bhavanaṃ agamāsi. Thero sabbampi bhayakālaṃ paṇṇakhādakamanusse nissāya vasi.
anya-e0907n0:439: Āvuso mahāsoṇa bhikkhāhāro paññāyatīti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ āropetvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ nīharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0907n0:440: Mahāsoṇatthero pañcabhikkhusataparivāro maṇḍalārāmavihāraṃ patto, ekeko navahatthasāṭakena saddhiṃ ekekakahāpaṇagghanakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ detūti manusse avocuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:441: Anāyatane naṭṭhānaṃ attabhāvānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi, buddhānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ karissāmīti cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā appaharitaṃ karoti.
anya-e0907n0:442: Mayaṃ tāva mahallakā, idaṃ nāma bhavissatīti na sakkā jānituṃ, tuvaṃ attānaṃ rakkheyyāsīti.
anya-e0907n0:443: Kahaṃ vattabbakanigrodhatthero, kahaṃ vattabbakanigrodhattheroti pucchitvā tassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
anya-e0907n0:446: Dhammasakaṭassa akkho bhijjati akkho bhijjatīti paridevamāno vicari.
anya-e0907n0:449_0: Cattārome āvuso sammappadhānā. Katame cattāro. Idhāvuso bhikkhu anuppannā me pāpakā
anya-e0907n0:449_1: akusalā dhammā uppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti, uppannā me pāpakā
anya-e0907n0:449_2: akusalā dhammā appahīyamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti, anuppannā me
anya-e0907n0:449_3: kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti, anuppannā me
anya-e0907n0:449_4: kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti, uppannā me kusalā
anya-e0907n0:449_5: dhammā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karotīti.
anya-e0907n0:450: Upajjhāyo me ativiya pasannacitto vandati, kiṃ nu kho pupphāni labhitvā pūjaṃ kareyyāsīti cintesi.
anya-e0907n0:456: Aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti pajānāti.
anya-e0907n0:457: Ajja satthā parinibbāyati, ajja sāsanaṃ osakkati, pacchimadassanaṃ dāni idaṃ amhākanti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṃ kāruññaṃ karissanti.
anya-e0907n0:458: Ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso, katamo ekapuggalo tathāgato bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddhoti.
anya-e0907n0:464: Kinnū me ettha gatena attho atthi natthīti atthānatthaṃ pariggahetvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:465: Āmisatopi vaḍḍhi atthoyeva, taṃ nissāya brahmacariyā nuggahāya paṭipannattāti vadanti.
anya-e0907n0:466: Mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dvekathā nāma nakathitapubbā, aññasmiṃ divase uparivisesaṃ nibbattessāmīti cintetvā “kiṃ bhante”ti paṭivacanaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0907n0:467: Bhante ete manussā tumhākaṃ kiṃhonti, mātipakkhato sambandhā pitipakkhatoti.
anya-e0907n0:468_0: Āvusoyaṃ mātāpitūhipi dukkaraṃ, taṃ ete manussā amhākaṃ karonti, pattacīvarampi no
anya-e0907n0:468_1: etesaṃ santakameva, etesaṃ ānubhāvena neva bhaye bhayaṃ na chātake chātakaṃ jānāma,
anya-e0907n0:468_2: edisānāma amhākaṃ upakārino natthīti tesaṃ guṇe kathento gacchati.
anya-e0907n0:469: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthītipi saññaṃ akatvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho nikkhamati.
anya-e0907n0:470_0: Āvuso tumhe na iṇaṭṭā na bhayaṭṭā na ājīvikā pakatā pabbajitā, dukkhā muccitukāmā
anya-e0907n0:470_1: panettha pabbajitā. Tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṃ gamaneyeva nigaṇhatha. Ṭhāne, nisajjāya,
anya-e0907n0:471: Ayaṃ bhikkhu tuyhaṃ uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ jānāti, ananucchavikaṃ te etanti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
anya-e0907n0:472: Ayaṃ thero punappunaṃ nivattitvā gacchati, kiṃ nukho maggamūḷho udāhu kiñci pamuṭṭhoti samullapanti.
anya-e0907n0:473: Kinnū kho ete amheheva saddhiṃ na sallapanti udāhu añña maññampi, yadi aññamaññampi na sallapanti, addhā vivādajātā bhavissanti.
anya-e0907n0:474: Aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati;
anya-e0907n0:477_0: Sace bhikkhave nandassa puratthimā disā āloketabbā hoti, sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā
anya-e0907n0:477_1: nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato nābhijjhā domanassā
anya-e0907n0:477_2: pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssavissantī’ti. Itiha sātthaka sampajāno hoti. Sace bhikkhave
anya-e0907n0:477_3: nandassa pacchimā disā, uttarā disā, dakkhiṇā disā, uddhaṃ, adho, anudisā anuviloketabbā
anya-e0907n0:477_4: hoti, sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ anuviloketi ‘evaṃ me anudisaṃ anuvilokayato…pe… sampajāno hotīti….
anya-e0907n0:482: Kasmā bhante sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjitthāti.
anya-e0907n0:483_0: Yato paṭṭhāya mayā āvuso kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikātuṃ āraddho, na me kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñjitvā
anya-e0907n0:483_1: hattho samiñjitapubbo, idāni pana me tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā
anya-e0907n0:483_2: samiñjito, tasmā puna yathā ṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti.
anya-e0907n0:484: Sādhu bhante bhikkhunā nāma evarūpena bhavitabbanti.
anya-e0907n0:488_0: Katamo ca puggalo samayavimutto, idhekacco puggalo kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ
anya-e0907n0:488_1: aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā
anya-e0907n0:490_0: Katamo ca puggalo asamayavimutto, idhekacco puggalo naheva kho kālena kālaṃ samayena
anya-e0907n0:490_1: samayaṃ aṭṭhavimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā
anya-e0907n0:490_2: honti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo asamayavimutto. Sabbepi ariya puggalā ariye vimokkhe asamayavimuttā.
anya-e0907n0:492_0: Katamo ca puggalo kuppadhammo, idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ
anya-e0907n0:492_1: vā samāpattīnaṃ, so ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasira lābhī,
anya-e0907n0:492_2: na yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi, ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ
anya-e0907n0:492_3: vijjhati, yaṃ tassa puggalassa pamādamāgamma tā samāpattiyo kuppeyyuṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati
anya-e0907n0:494_0: Katamo ca puggalo sattakkhattuparamo, idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā
anya-e0907n0:494_1: sotāpanno hoti avinipāta dhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo, so sattakkhattuṃ deve ca
anya-e0907n0:494_2: mānuse ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo sattakkhattuparamo.
anya-e0907n0:496_0: Soto sototi hidaṃ sāriputta vuccati, katamo nukho sāriputta sototi. Ayameva hi bhante
anya-e0907n0:496_1: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo soto. Seyyathidaṃ, sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhīti. Sotāpanno
anya-e0907n0:496_2: sotāpannoti hidaṃ sāriputta vuccati, katamo nukho sāriputta sotāpannoti. Yo hi bhante
anya-e0907n0:496_3: iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato, ayaṃ vuccati sotāpanno, svāyaṃ āyasmā
anya-e0907n0:498_0: Katamo ca puggalo kolaṃ kolo. Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno
anya-e0907n0:498_1: hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo, so dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā
anya-e0907n0:498_2: saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ vuccati kolaṃ kolo.
anya-e0907n0:500_0: Katamo ca puggalo ekabījī, idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno
anya-e0907n0:500_1: hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo, so ekaṃyeva mānusakaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā
anya-e0907n0:500_2: dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ekabījī.
anya-e0907n0:502_0: Katamo ca puggalo sakadāgāmī, idhe kacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ
anya-e0907n0:502_1: tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo sakadāgāmī.
